item.title: By: #JeSuisBourgoiseBlancHomme #ConquestofDough. Je Suis Bourgoise Blanc Homme. Stay Safe online and on the streets. #OccupyTheEuropeanSpring – RogersLongHairBlog

item.title: By: Clive Lord
item.dc:creator: Clive Lord
item.description: My main thrust? Save the planet from ecological destruction. Secondary aim: whilst preserving social justice. Method: Includes a Basic income - not a panacea, just a sine qua non. Inequality is not a crucial issue if everyone is guaranteed basic needs AND ecological limits are observed.
item.content:encoded:
My main thrust? Save the planet from ecological destruction. Secondary aim: whilst preserving social justice.
Method: Includes a Basic income – not a panacea, just a sine qua non. Inequality is not a crucial issue if everyone is guaranteed basic needs AND ecological limits are observed.
